data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Sipaliwini, Suriname.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sipaliwini, Suriname
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 5,909 believers in the state of Sipaliwini to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next week to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Sipaliwini, Suriname.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, teach the 5,909 believers in Sipaliwini that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Sipaliwini words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Saramaccan people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Saramaccan people know you.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 10,170 people in the state of Sipaliwini who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: There are 34,500 people living in the state of Sipaliwini. Only about 5,909 might be believers.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sipaliwini, Suriname has a population of 34,500.

We estimate Sipaliwini has 5,909 people who might know Jesus, 10,170 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 18,421 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 5,909 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.
